== SampleTeam Knowledge Base ==

Every team is encouraged to build a knowledge base of information about the team, solving problems and achieving the goals of the team. This knowledge base is a number of documents all linked from the Knowledge Base team page. This provides a library of information for team members. A good example of this is the <nowiki>[[LoCoTeamKnowledgeBase|LoCo Knowledge Base]]</nowiki>
